<sn><md class="p-1 p-md-2 my-2" data-rr="true">#### **C9 Higher Math**
---
| Credit | Topic                                |
|------------|--------------------------------------|
| 1          | Set and Function                     |
| 2          | Algebraic Expression                 |
| 3          | Geometry                             |
| 4          | Geometric Constructions              |
| 5          | Equation                             |
| 6          | Inequality                           |
| 7          | Infinite Series                      |
| 8          | Trigonometry                         |
| 9          | Exponential and Logarithmic Function |
| 10         | Binomial Expansion                   |
| 11         | Coordinate Geometry                  |
| 12         | Planar Vector                        |
| 13         | Solid Geometry                       |
| 14         | Probability                          |
</md></sn>
